__e: You have nothing to apologize to me about,ok?
It is true, I am asking myself why I am doing this, especially as it is you who should be apologising to me.
After everything I've put you through, you don't ever have to apologize to me about how you feel.
After everything I've put you through, you don't ever have to apologize to me about how you feel.
It is true, I am asking myself why I am doing this, especially as it is you who should be apologising to me.
What I've never understood is why you don't put yourself in a position to stop apologizing to people.
You shouldn't be sorry for saying what you mean.
I'm sorry about my family and the--the book and the chicken-- you don't have to apologize about your family.
But you're here, so I'm thinking this is your way of apologizing for that wrath I endured earlier today.
And then I realized, it's the two-year anniversary of my sister's murder, which means you must be here to apologize for letting it happen.
You didn't have to apologize for not believing me.
You don't need to apologize for what you said about The Plan.
